WorkItem.Description:
There are some items (weapons) that are not detected by the CharacterProfiler import tool as equippable. Also, it does not work with the German client. Both can easily fixed by changing Rawr.Base\CharacterProfilerData.cs:   static readonly string[] s_asEquippableTooltipKeywords = { // English "
Head", "
Neck", "
Shoulder", "
Back", "
Chest", "
Wrist", "
Hands", "
Waist", "
Legs", "
Feet", "
Finger", "
Trinket", "
Main Hand", "
One-Hand", "
Off Hand", "
Held In Off-hand", "
Two-Hand", "
Relic", "
Ranged", "
Thrown", "
Projectile",   // German "
Kopf", "
Hals", "
Schulter", "
Rücken", "
Brust", "

Hände", "
Taille", "

Füße", "

Einhändig", "

In Schildhand geführt", "
Zweihändig", "
Relikt", "
Distanz", "
Wurfwaffe", "
Projektil", };
WorkItem.Summary: Improvement of item detection with CharacterProfiler
